statements: UPDATE FraudulentActivities SET transaction_amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '45bcdd58-986a-4c32-bf6a-36de2b80754a';
UPDATE FraudulentActivities SET suspicious_pattern = 'High Risk' WHERE transaction_id = '5570c551-f865-402b-a5bc-1c2db4f14c18';
UPDATE FraudulentActivities SET transaction_date = '2023-09-15 12:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 'cbf3cc16-3744-4932-a53f-f419d2858411';
UPDATE FraudulentActivities SET suspicious_pattern = 'High Amount' WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
UPDATE FraudulentActivities SET suspicious_pattern = 'Suspicious Date' WHERE transaction_date = '2021-08-20 12:00:00'
UPDATE FraudulentActivities SET suspicious_pattern = 'Potential Fraud' WHERE transaction_amount > 500 AND transaction_date = '2021-08-20 12:00:00'
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET flagged = true WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET amount = 150.25 WHERE amount < 100;
UPDATE suspicious_patterns SET pattern_description = 'New Description' WHERE pattern_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET flagged = true WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET flagged = true WHERE amount > 5000;
UPDATE suspicious_patterns SET pattern_criteria = '{"criteria": "high risk"}' WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%fraud%'
UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE suspicious_patterns SET threshold = 0.1 WHERE pattern_id = 5678;
UPDATE flagged_transactions SET resolution_status = 'resolved' WHERE flag_id = 9876;
UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-01-20 10:30:00', amount = 500.00 WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE suspicious_patterns SET threshold = 0.75, flagged_date = NOW() WHERE pattern_id = 2001;

UPDATE flagged_transactions SET flag_reason = 'Fraudulent activity detected', resolution_status = 'pending' WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE is_suspicious = true);
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001'
UPDATE flags SET flag_description = 'Updated flag description' WHERE flag_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002'
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE is_flagged = true;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
UPDATE flags SET flag_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE flag_type = 'Priority';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET is_verified = true WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE transaction_flags SET flag_reason = 'Fraudulent activity detected' WHERE flag_id = 2;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.1 WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE customers SET is_verified = TRUE WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000);
UPDATE transaction_flags SET flag_reason = 'Suspicious transaction' WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE);
